subject: Fwd: Simsonn pro x ultra troubleshoot
description_text:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Simsonn,
> 
> 
> 
> I’m experiencing a serious issue with my Pro X Ultra pedals. The throttle signal flickers/jumps erratically in DIView, Windows, and iRacing — even when the throttle pedal cable is completely unplugged.
> 
> 
> 
> What I’ve tested:
> 
> 
> 
> Different USB ports
> Swapped cables between the brake and throttle
> Confirmed brake works fine
> Tried calibration and firmware software
> Throttle input flickers in DIView even with no cable connected
> 
> 
> 
> 
> There’s no visible serial number on the unit, and it doesn’t show in the Simsonn software. 
> 
> Order number: SSN1791
> 
> Date of purchase: 06-18-2025 (june 18th)
> 
> Purchased through simsonn website.
> 
> 
> 
> Attached is a video of what the USB controller is showing, both with and without pedals plugged in.
> 
> 
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> Michael Aliffi
>

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5132 中

Hi Michaelaliffi,        Please try the following steps:    Go to Settings → Update and update to the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2;    After the update, restart the software, then update your pedal firmware;    Confirm that the firmware versions are CPU1: 2.0.5 / CPU2: 2.0.4;    Test again to see if the issue persists.    If the problem remains, we can send you a new throttle sensor for replacement.        https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
